Name: Blightsteel Colossus
Story Background: Forged in the heart of ancient Phyrexia, the Blightsteel Colossus is a nightmarish creation of dark sorcery and destructive ambition, an unyielding force of unstoppable annihilation.
Ability: Trample, Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.), Indestructible (This creature can't be destroyed by damage or effects that say "destroy.")
Appearance Description: The Blightsteel Colossus is an immense, towering golem constructed of jet-black metal and adorned with menacing, razor-sharp spikes and coils of noxious, green-tinged mist. Its eyes gleam with malevolent intent, and its every movement radiates an aura of inevitable doom.
